alert.note: Alert for Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 6:54PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Troup County through 730 PM EDT... At 654 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Long Cane, or 7 miles north of Lanett, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... LaGrange, West Point, Piedmont Heights, Cannonville, Baughs Crossroads, State Line Park, Abbottsford, Smiths Crossroad, Long Cane and Jones Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
